other_tests.findings: Plasma hormone concentrations showed significant variations; notably: cortisol was at 28 mg/dL, 17-hydroxyprogesterone was 10,000 ng/dL.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At 10.9 years, hormonal profile was essentially unchanged except for plasma progesterone level which rose to 7.4 pmol/L.

other_tests.findings: Patients were homozygous at all loci genotyped.
Compatible with the presence of adrenal rests in the testes.
